OrderSettings.name: OrderSettings
OrderSettings.label: Order Settings
OrderSettings.description: Represents OrderSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableNegativeQuantity.description: enable Negative Quantity field of OrderSettings metadata component.

enableOrders.description: enable Orders field of OrderSettings metadata component.

enableReductionOrders.description: enable Reduction Orders field of OrderSettings metadata component.

enableZeroQuantity.description: enable Zero Quantity field of OrderSettings metadata component.
